Author: raccoonliner
Text: i have talked with my dad about it, but sadly my mom is also super controlling to him and refuses to listen to an opinion that isn’t her own. when she’s not around he is laxer on rules though

Author: genomskinligt
Text: can you talk with your dad so he can talk to your mom? seems that your mom is overly controlling and won’t listen to you even though you know what hasn’t worked for you in the past.
